name: Play Boy
content: Have you heard?

name: Gorgeous Woman
content: Heard what?

name: Play Boy
content: Rumor is there are people still left up on the surface.

name: Gorgeous Woman
content: Don't be ridiculous.

name: Play Boy
content: Apparently, if you wait until 11 PM,

name: Play Boy
content: you'll get a voice message on your phone. It's happened to over 10 people already.

name: Gorgeous Woman
content: No kidding. Is that why you're here? I was wondering why you weren't heading inside.

name: Play Boy
content: Aren't you curious?

name: Gorgeous Woman
content: Sure I am.

name: Play Boy
content: Let's give it shot, then.

name: Narration
content: The man lifted his cellphone high up to the sky.

name: Gorgeous Woman
content: You look ridiculous. How long do you plan on...

name: Narration
content: *Beep*

name: Gorgeous Woman
content: Huh?

name: Play Boy
content: I got something!

name: Gorgeous Woman
content: F-from the surface?

name: Play Boy
content: I-I don't know.

name: Gorgeous Woman
content: Let's listen to it.

name: Narration
content: The man's hands tremble as he goes to check the voice message.

name: Narration
content: Amongst heavy static, a short voice message can be heard.

name: Narration
content: [-----Everyone gathers.]

name: Narration
content: [This place----------paradise.]

name: Narration
content: [-----Everyone gathers.][This place----------paradise.]

name: andersen
content: For the past few days, a select few have been receiving this message on their cellphones.

name: andersen
content: Rumors are starting to spread. People say they're being sent by a survivor up on the surface.

name: anis
content: Give me a break. This is grade school level pranking.

name: anis
content: People actually believe this could be from the surface? How gullible can you get...

name: anis
content: ... Was it something I said?

name: rapi
content: This message wasn't sent from inside the Ark.

name: andersen
content: That's right.

name: andersen
content: There's no doubt about it. This came from the surface.

name: neon
content: Wow...

name: andersen
content: We're fairly sure we pinpointed the location it was sent from.

name: andersen
content: I want you to go there and investigate.

name: Self
content: What exactly are we looking for?

name: andersen
content: Confirm whether there are any survivors out there.

name: Self
content: What then?

name: andersen
content: That depends on what your investigation turns up.

name: andersen
content: If there's anyone remaining on the surface,

name: andersen
content: the Ark will have to come up with a new policy.

name: neon
content: Officially, the number of people left on the surface is 0, right?

name: andersen
content: That's right. There's a lot riding on this, more than you can imagine.

name: andersen
content: For some reason, this rumor is spreading quickly on the Ark.

name: andersen
content: The Central Government is demanded to publish the truth,

name: andersen
content: and I have to give them something. In order to do that, I need to launch an investigation.

name: Self
content: Understood.

name: andersen
content: Watch your back out there.

name: rapi
content: Surface entry complete. Moving towards the marked location.

name: neon
content: How long will it take?

name: rapi
content: We'll arrive before the night is out.

name: anis
content: If there aren't any nasty surprises, that is.

name: Self
content: Let's go.

name: rapi
content: Roger.

name: neon
content: Should we run there? I'm so curious.

name: anis
content: It might be possible if you carry the Commander.

name: neon
content: Oh... forget it then. Master is too heavy for that. Let's just walk.

name: rapi
content: Move out.

name: rapi
content: ... Huh?

name: anis
content: What's wrong?

name: neon
content: Does your stomach hurt?

name: rapi
content: I just got a voice message.

name: anis
content: What does it say?

name: rapi
content: Hold on.

content: [-----Everyone gathers.]

content: [This place----------paradise.]

name: anis
content: Same as what we heard before...

name: neon
content: Is it just me, or does it sound clearer?

name: Self
content: It's definitely easier to make out.

name: rapi
content: There's less static.

name: rapi
content: That means we're heading in the right direction.

name: Self
content: Let's keep going.

name: rapi
content: Yes, Commander.

name: neon
content: I'm curious about something.

name: anis
content: Save it. You don't have to know everything.

name: neon
content: You're reacting too strongly to a voice message.

name: anis
content: Then, what should I do?

name: rapi
content: Commander, I'm seeing a building ahead of us.
Let's listen to Neon.
...Let's have a conversation about one thing.
name: Choice
neon
content: I was the first to speak,

name: neon
content: so let's talk about what I'm curious about.

name: Self
content: I'm curious too.

name: rapi
content: During the 1st Rapture Invasion, the entire human race fled to the Ark.

name: rapi
content: In the decades that followed,

name: rapi
content: the Rapture laid waste to mankind's old home.

name: rapi
content: They've demolished all the significant landmarks, and slaughtered all the humans left on the surface.

name: anis
content: They operated with incredible precision. Especially when it came to killing humans.

name: anis
content: On the surface, there may be a chance of coming across some old knick-knacks or settlements,

name: anis
content: but the Raptures didn't leave a single human alive.

name: neon
content: But the surface is a big place, isnâ€™t it?

name: neon
content: It'd be impossible to search every nook and cranny.

name: neon
content: How can you be so sure there aren't any survivors?

name: Self
content: ... So you've decided.

name: rapi
content: The surface is crawling with Raptures. We couldn't possibly comb every inch of it.

name: rapi
content: However, that didn't stop us from trying. For decades, we sent out search parties,

name: rapi
content: but not a single living human was ever found. Not one.

name: anis
content: Not only that, we never received any distress signals.

name: anis
content: So, the Central Government made an official statement.

name: anis
content: They claimed there were no survivors on the surface, and called off any further searches.

name: neon
content: So it's unprecedented to be receiving a voice message like this.

name: anis
content: Exactly.

name: neon
content: Okay, now I understand.

name: Self
content: I just hope we can find some survivors.

name: rapi
content: Likewise.

name: anis
content: Me too.

name: rapi
content: Commander. The sun is setting faster than expected.

name: rapi
content: This would be a perfect spot to set up camp. The hill will be to our backs, so we'll only need to watch the front.

name: Self
content: Understood.

name: anis
content: I'll go set up some decoys.

name: neon
content: I'll come with you.

name: rapi
content: Okay, thanks.

name: Narration
content: Anis and Neon went to set up the decoys.

name: rapi
content: The temperature and humidity look ideal.

name: rapi
content: Let me know if you're not comfortable.

name: rapi
content: What would you like for dinner?

name: Self
content: I'm not hungry.

name: rapi
content: Very well.

name: Self
content: Rapi.

name: rapi
content: Yes?

name: Self
content: Do you think there's a settlement out there?

name: rapi
content: If I'm being honest, no. Even if there is one, it's almost certainly been raided.

name: rapi
content: The Raptures are consumed with the desire to attack humans.

name: rapi
content: Even if there were enough survivors to constitute a settlement, it couldn't have withstood a Rapture attack.

name: rapi
content: Humans are powerless in front of those foul creatures.

name: Self
content: Are you positive there's nothing out there?

name: rapi
content: Never say never.

name: rapi
content: Even if the probability of anything existing is near zero, this search isn't in vain.

name: Self
content: I appreciate you saying that.

name: rapi
content: Don't worry about it.

name: Monologue
content: Soon after, Anis and Neon came back.

name: Monologue
content: Rapi decided to keep watch while the rest of us went asleep.

name: Monologue
content: I'm not sure how long I slept.

name: Monologue
content: It's still dark out. Everything is quiet.

name: Monologue
content: Despite all that, I still woke up...

name: Monologue
content: I felt as if we were being watched.

name: Self
content: Rap...

name: rapi
content: Sssh.

name: rapi
content: Keep quiet. No sudden movements.

name: rapi
content: It's looking right at us.

name: Self
content: What is?

name: rapi
content: Straight ahead, 11 o'clock.

name: Monologue
content: I turned in the direction Rapi mentioned.

name: Monologue
content: All I see is complete darkness.

name: Monologue
content: Suddenly, in the darkness, I see what looks like blueish lights.

name: rapi
content: Do you see it?

name: Self
content: I only see some kind of blue light.

name: rapi
content: That's the light reflecting from their eyes. Tigers.

name: Self
content: Tigers...?!

name: rapi
content: Four of them. Two adults and two babies. I think it's a family.

name: Self
content: What should we do?

name: rapi
content: So long as we don't make any sudden movements, they'll leave us alone.

name: rapi
content: They don't look like they're on the prowl for food.

name: Monologue
content: As my eyes adjusted to the darkness, the tigers become more visible.

name: Monologue
content: Two of them are about 3 meters in length, and two seem to be babies.

name: Monologue
content: A deer carcass dangles from the jaws of one of the adults.

name: Monologue
content: The tigers stared at us for a while, then slowly turned around and left.

name: rapi
content: All clear.

name: Self
content: That's my first time seeing a tiger in real life.

name: rapi
content: Me too.
That was absolutely thrilling.
That was terrifying.
name: Choice
rapi
content: Yes, perhaps because there was an element of danger to it.

name: rapi
content: There was once an incident where 10 tigers managed to take down a Nikke.

name: rapi
content: If they'd rushed at us, I'd have had to open fire and alert the Raptures to our position.

name: rapi
content: It's a good thing they'd already had a successful hunt.

name: rapi
content: You can go back to sleep.

name: Self
content: I don't think I'll be able to sleep after that.

name: rapi
content: I don't blame you.

name: anis

name: anis

name: neon
content: No way!

name: neon
content: Why didn't you wake me up?! I'd have loved to see a tiger!

name: anis

name: anis

name: anis

name: rapi

name: anis
content: It's even clearer than before.

name: neon

name: rapi

name: anis

name: anis

name: anis

name: anis

name: rapi

name: rapi

name: anis
content: Not too well thanks to the fog, but I can still make out the outline.

name: rapi
content: The coordinates show the message originating from there. It must be being sent from the transmission tower.

name: anis
content: We're almost there then.

name: anis
content: Let's go.

name: neon
content: Any chance we can stop and smell the roses?

name: anis
content: Come again?

name: neon
content: Since it's a tourist attraction, there must be a lot to see.

name: anis
content: I won't stop you, but I wouldn't recommend it.

name: neon
content: How come?

name: anis
content: What do you think happened to all the humans who weren't chosen to stay in the Ark?

name: anis
content: Back then, human weaponry didn't even leave a scratch on Raptures.

name: anis
content: It was suicide to engage the enemy.

name: anis
content: All people could do was evade the Raptures until the Ark opened its doors once again,

name: anis
content: or find a different place to hide out permanently.

name: anis
content: Raptures were bloodthirsty beyond all reason,

name: anis
content: and the Ark has never re-opened its doors.

name: anis
content: Some people fell into despair and gave up,

name: anis
content: but some sought out major cities.

name: anis
content: They wanted to die with some dignity,

name: anis
content: in a place that reminded them of better days.

name: anis
content: You see how the roads are all deserted?

name: anis
content: That's because everyone ended it quietly in their own homes.

name: anis
content: If you start poking around, you'll end up seeing more than you bargained for.

name: neon
content: ... I understand. I won't interfere.

name: rapi

content: The Ferris wheel makes an ominous sound as it slowly ascends.

name: Monologue
content: After a while, it reaches its peak.

name: Monologue
content: Suddenly, I saw the land laid out before me.

name: Monologue
content: A vast expanse, reaching out into infinity.

name: Monologue
content: It was a far cry from the views seen in the Ark.

name: Monologue
content: As I watched, it was as if I could hear the landscape speak to me,

name: Monologue
content: How long are you going to continue living in the cramped, dark place?

name: Narration
content: No Caller ID: END

name: andersen
content: Looks like we can close this case.

name: andersen
content: So that voice message came all the way from that theme park...

name: andersen
content: Certainly didn't expect that.

name: andersen
content: Anyway, since you ensured all power was shut off, it shouldn't happen again.

name: andersen
content: Anything else to report?

name: Self
content: I rode the Ferris wheel.

name: andersen
content: Did you say 'Ferris wheel'?

name: Self
content: It was the tallest in the entire world.

name: andersen
content: ... I see.

name: andersen
content: How was it?

name: Self
content: It was fun.

name: andersen
content: ... Glad to hear it. You can leave now.

name: andersen
content: Shifty.

name: shifty
content: Yes?

name: andersen
content: Run a probability for me on a scenario.

name: andersen
content: A derelict theme park that's been abandoned for decades,

name: andersen
content: with only a Ferris wheel still operating, transmits a voice message which reaches the Ark.

name: shifty
content: One moment.

name: andersen
content: All right, I get the picture.

name: andersen
content: Somehow, it managed to defy those odds.

name: andersen
content: Unless there was some external force helping it along...

name: andersen
content: Anyway,

name: andersen
content: we'll consider this case closed. Good job.

name: andersen
content: It doesn't matter if something like this happens occasionally.
